alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:02PM CDT until August 04 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN SALINE AND NORTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Malta Bend, or 10 miles southeast of Carrollton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Waverly, Malta Bend, Wakenda and Grand Pass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
